name: relatim-ai-chat-monorepo
description: Relatim AI Chat Application - Full Stack

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && cp ../.env .env && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && echo 'REACT_APP_API_URL=/api' > .env && echo 'REACT_APP_SOCKET_URL=/' >> .env && echo 'REACT_APP_NODE_ENV=production' >> .env && echo 'GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false' >> .env && npm install && npm run build
